message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the opportunity to get this product. However, $100 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  I'm happy to offer you $85 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $95. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
Alice, I understand you're trying to get a good price, but $95 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $90.  It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident I'll enjoy the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob! However, I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $92. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
